description: Conduct market research to identify target demographics and refine marketing messaging.
Conduct user training sessions to ensure effective and efficient use of software applications.
Lead and facilitate focus groups to gather consumer insights and preferences.
Develop and execute a corporate social responsibility (CSR) initiative to support social and environmental causes.
Coordinate and oversee user acceptance testing to validate system functionality.
Develop and execute a customer retention program to improve loyalty and reduce churn.
Create and deliver training programs to enhance employees' leadership and management skills.
Develop and execute a digital marketing campaign to increase online brand presence.
Conduct competitor analysis to identify market gaps and develop a competitive advantage.
Develop and implement key performance indicators (KPIs) to track project success and performance.
